How to recreate [trending TikTok nail design] that actually looks salon-quality
How to find a nail tech who listens instead of doing their own thing
How to get wedding-ready nails in [timeframe] even if they're damaged now

tiktok.hook: POV: You've been hiding your nails for months
tiktok.body: Show damaged nails in first 3 seconds. Cut to soaking/prep process with text overlay 'We don't cover damage, we repair it'. Show gentle cuticle work, strengthening treatment application. Before/after split screen at 30 seconds. Close-up of healthy, natural-looking nails. Text: 'From paper-thin to strong in 4 weeks'. Show client confidently showing off hands in meeting.
tiktok.cta: Link in bio to book your nail recovery consultation

reels.hook: The real reason your manicure chips in 3 days
reels.body: Quick cuts showing common mistakes: rushed cuticle prep, thick polish layers, no base coat, improper curing. Text overlays with X marks. Then show proper technique in 15 seconds: thorough prep, thin layers, proper sealing. End with '3 weeks later' showing perfect manicure.
reels.cta: Save this for your next appointment

ugc_prompts.prompt: Show us your before/after nail transformation! Film a quick video showing your nails when you arrived vs. when you left. Tell us how long it's been since your appointment and if you're still chip-free.
What's your go-to nail color that makes you feel confident? Show us your current manicure and tell us where you wear it most (work, events, everyday).

viral_triggers.angle: Nail tech reacts to viral DIY nail hacks - testing what actually works vs. what damages nails
viral_triggers.why: Combines trending content format with educational value; viewers tag friends to debate; encourages comments; positions salon as expert authority

viral_triggers.angle: Time-lapse of extreme nail transformation with cost breakdown overlay showing salon service vs. months of DIY attempts
viral_triggers.why: Satisfying visual content; addresses price objection with value demonstration; shareable before/after; validates investment in professional service
